description: The Continuous Integration (VHDL simulation) can be launched on any computer. So, the path must be dynamically computed by the python script from this file path
This json file define the tree structure of the source file for the simulation
This file will be an input of the associated launch_sim.py python script
From this file, the lauch_sim.py python script will generated an intermadiary output file (launch_sim_processed.json) will some fields which will be automatically filled
This output file will be used by the python script associated to the simulation of the VHDL module to get the path to the directory where source files are
Prerequisite:
.Before running simulation, on the simulation runner computer, Vivado must be installed. Its Xilinx library should be compiled with Modelsim and/or Questa
Then, some environnement variables should be defined:
. MODELSIM_PATH: path to root directory of the modelsim.exe
. QUESTA_PATH: path to root directory of the questasim.exe
. MODELSIM_XILINX_COMPIL_LIB_PATH: path to root directory of the xilinx IP compiled by the modelsim simulator
. QUESTA_XILINX_COMPIL_LIB_PATH: path to root directory of the xilinx IP compiled by the questa simulator
The path parameter will be automatically filled by the launch_sim.py python script
The launch_sim.py python and the launch_sim.json should be placed at the git repository root
On the simulation runner computer, the user must define an environnement variable called VUNIT_PATH
The value of the environnement variable should be the path to the vunit directory
The path parameter will be automatically filled by the launch_sim.py python script with the environnement variable value
On the simulation runner computer, the user must define an environnement variable called MODELSIM_PATH (if the modelsim VHDL simulator is used)
The value of the environnement variable should be the path to the modelsim.exe
The path parameter will be automatically filled by the launch_sim.py python script with the environnement variable value
On the simulation runner computer, the user must define an environnement variable called QUESTA_PATH (if the questa VHDL simulator is used)
The value of the environnement variable should be the path to the modelsim.exe
The path parameter will be automatically filled by the launch_sim.py python script with the environnement variable value
On the simulation runner computer, the user must define an environnement variable called MODELSIM_XILINX_COMPIL_LIB_PATH (if the modelsim VHDL simulator is used)
The value of the environnement variable should be the path to the xilinx library compiled by the modelsim simulator
The path parameter will be automatically filled by the launch_sim.py python script with the environnement variable value
On the simulation runner computer, the user must define an environnement variable called QUESTA_XILINX_COMPIL_LIB_PATH (if the questa VHDL simulator is used)
The value of the environnement variable should be the path to the xilinx library compiled by the questa simulator
The path parameter will be automatically filled by the launch_sim.py python script with the environnement variable value
